items.name: Priya S.
items.quote: I started with zero confidence. The mentors explained tools in simple language and helped me use AI for daily tasks, content, and learning.

items.name: Rahul K.
items.quote: The cohort helped me build follow-up automation and content workflows. I started seeing time savings within the first two weeks.

items.name: Akhila M.
items.quote: The practical sessions and review feedback were the difference. I left with portfolio-ready work instead of only notes.

items.name: Sandeep R.
items.quote: I joined for AI basics but stayed for the accountability. The mentors were patient and tailored examples to my business use-cases.

items.name: Nandini P.
items.quote: The assignments were simple to start and progressively better. I now know how to write prompts and present AI-assisted outputs confidently.

items.name: Vivek T.
items.quote: Clear structure, real exercises, and mentor review. This felt like practical coaching, not generic online videos.
